sentence.idiomatic: How much money can you earn per month working for him?
Of course working for other people is tiring, but if you don't go to work you won't have money to live on.
When he was eighteen, he went to the city to work.
It's up to you, we'll eat whatever you want to eat.
This matter concerns everyone. You can't just do as you please.
You are our elder. We will do whatever you like.
He is a very good and considerate husband.
He only cares about himself, he doesn't show any consideration to others.
She has dinner waiting for you when you get home, how can that not be considerate enough for you?
He is so funny. He is constantly telling jokes to everyone.
He is joking with you. I didn't realize you have such a poor grasp of humor.
Actually he is a very humorous person. Spending time with him is very relaxing.
He does everything with a great sense of responsibility.
He is afraid to admit his mistakes. From this point we can see that he lacks in a sense of responsibility.
We need to find a person with a strong sense of responsibility to lead the company.
Are things obtained by money worth cherishing?
We should cherish the friendship between us forever.
You must cherish this rare learning opportunity.
He is a person who lays a lot of stress on emotions, he always puts emotions first.
On formal occasions you must pay special attention to your speech and actions.
Does this organization care about their members' kindness or their status?
With each other's encouragement, in the end these two brothers solved the problem.
They have been friends for decades. They talk about everything with each other.
As long as you can help each other, you will definitely succeed.
Zhang Liang, it's so late and you still aren't leaving?
Yeah, I have to work overtime again.
Me too. Lately there is just way too much work. We have to work so late every day.
Oh well, working for other people... what can you do?
So, when will you eat dinner? Why don't we go eat together?
Sure. For this stretch we've been working so hard, we definitely should have something good. What would you like to eat?
Whatever you’d like is fine. I didn’t know you were also so considerate. It would be so wonderful to be your girlfriend.
Oh, I’m not that great. I don’t think I’m anything special.
Oh, you’re too humble. I think you’re not only funny and considerate, but also very responsible. Nowadays, where can a girl find a good man like you?
Wow, Li Fei, I really have to thank you for your praise.

I’m serious. If I had a boyfriend like you, I would definitely not take him for granted. I think nowadays people place too much importance on money and material things. Actually, what is important is how two people feel about each other.
You’re right. It’s just that there are fewer and fewer people who think like that.
That’s because you haven’t been paying any attention—in fact, there is someone like that right here beside you.
